title: "The rules of typography have been around 300 years"...
content: Pagehand a typographically savvy word processor. Despite a weak start there's actually some interesting stuff here. comments.content:
It does seem to strike an interesting balance between word processing and simple InDesign layouting. I especially like how easy it is to get to the ornamentals and everything else.

Of course, the fact that it crashed on me twice within 5 minutes made me a little skeptical.
